::: {.cell hash='inline-code_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_09b558df52dd9e879a9427e7bb8f8b38'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```
````
:::


The dataset contains 344 penguin size measurements from
Adelie, Gentoo, Chinstrap species across Torgersen, Biscoe, Dream
islands..

## What about formatting?


::: {.cell hash='inline-code_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_64c45e2bec5ff912665e338835a67b0d'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
pen_summary <- penguins |> 
  group_by(species) |> 
  summarize(avg_mass = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE))
```
````
:::


The average body mass by species is 3700.6622517, 3733.0882353, 5076.0162602.

We can do better!


::: {.cell hash='inline-code_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_4e9e62a9c03ee251797c9d641ab372ab'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
body_mass <- scales::label_number(big.mark = ",", accuracy = 0.1, suffix = "g")(pull(pen_summary, avg_mass))

body_mass
```
````

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "3,700.7g" "3,733.1g" "5,076.0g"
```
:::
:::


The average body mass by species is 3,700.7g, 3,733.1g, 5,076.0g.

We can still do better!


::: {.cell hash='inline-code_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_07d5acb6f06fc51ed75c5277b35ad513'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
mass_reporter <- glue::glue_collapse(body_mass, sep = ", ", last = ", and ")
```
````
:::


The average body mass by species is 3,700.7g, 3,733.1g, and 5,076.0g.

## Reporting with lists

[Credit to TJ Mahr](https://www.tjmahr.com/lists-knitr-secret-weapon/)


::: {.cell hash='inline-code_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_817248b113ca13869987bf2566dbd23b'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
knitted <- list(
  when = format(Sys.Date()),
  with = system("quarto --version", intern = TRUE)
)
```
````
:::


Reported prepared on 2023-12-14 with quarto version
1.3.433.
